thread.title: SEC warns bitcoin investors at risk

title: SEC warns bitcoin investors at risk
text:
SEC warns bitcoin investors at risk   01:24 
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission warned Thursday that investors should 'exercise caution' with cryptocurrencies like bitcoin, noting state and federal regulators may not be able to recoup any lost investments from illegal actors.   
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission warned Thursday that investors should 'exercise caution' with cryptocurrencies like bitcoin, noting state and federal regulators may not be able to recoup any lost investments from illegal actors.  //reut.rs/2CHlZbp
